title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the series section
2. Select a series for which there is no data
3. Verify that a friendly error message is displayed to remind the user that there is no data for the selected series
